intro.title: Hi, I’m Cameron Young
intro.subtitle: An Angular front-end developer who loves building scalable, production-grade apps. Explore my online résumé by seeing my thinking and code in action inside this application.

purpose.title: Why this site exists
paragraphs: This isn’t just a résumé — it’s a working Angular 18 app that shows how I build: signals for state, typed forms, clean services, dependency injection with InjectionTokens, RxJS for orchestration, and secure auth via interceptors/guards.
Inside you’ll explore my profile (who I am), projects (problems solved), and the architecture that powers this site — visible, testable, and production-minded.
